name: Kiniro no Corda 2 f
overview: This is a sequel to "Kiniro no Corda", a love simulation game in which you take control of Kahoko, a female student. The stage is Seisou High School, six months after the previous title. She plans to have an ensemble concert with her friends. It is necessary to enhance their playing techniques and keep good relationships with other members. Have a successful ensemble concert!
